body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Son of Azubah Ammerman. Married to Amanda Jane Allen Ammerman in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on January 29, 1852. Father of Susan Ammerman, Ida Ammerman, and Allen Ammerman. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860. Farmer in Scott County in 1863.
